entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sechelt 7:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
